::Slayer::

Slayer manuevers out of the way of most of the shots fired at him, 
but more and more were beginning to hit him. He swears, opening his 
comm to Prebon again.

"Commander, I can't hold out much longer. I'm fighting an army here."

He aims at Dragonfly, firing two missiles, mechfluid leaking from his 
wounds.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> 7-batprobes/Dragonfly/Shivah/Luzbel::
> 
> 
> Others probes arrived, now they're 7 that shot and bites when they 
> had a chance.
> 
> Dragonfly and other two bots were arriving in diferents directions 
> shooting against Slayer.
